headline: 2 Top Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy in January
summary: Finding top artificial intelligence (AI) stocks to buy right now is not a simple endeavor.  Fortunately, even if finding the "best" AI stocks is elusive, we can assume AI will probably drive stock gains for years to come, meaning investors have not missed out.  Amid the AI-driven gains in many stocks, investors seem to have forgotten about Qualcomm (NASDAQ: QCOM).

headline: Warren Buffett Sells Apple Stock and Buys a Restaurant Stock Up 3,100% Since Its IPO
summary: Warren Buffett reportedly manages about 90% of Berkshire Hathaway's (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B) equity securities portfolio, while understudies Todd Combs and Ted Weschler handle the rest.  The company does not disclose which investment manager makes each individual trade, but Buffett is almost certainly in charge of large positions like Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL).  Despite once calling Apple the "best business" in the world, Buffett sold 100 million shares in the third quarter, cutting Berkshire's stake by 25%.
